titleStmt.title: The Countesse of Pembrokes Emanuel Conteining the natiuity, passion, buriall, and resurrection of Christ: togeather with certaine Psalmes of Dauid. All in English hexameters. By Abraham Fraunce.
titleStmt.author: Fraunce, Abraham, fl. 1587-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Thomas Orwyn] for William Ponsonby, dwelling in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Bishops head,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with the printer's name in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
